full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE BSGRUB BU STON GONG KHUGS MA'I DBANG CHOG RDO RJE'I TSE SROG DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B (CES BKA' LUNG NAN GYIS PHEBS PAR BRTEN, ,PAn CHEN PADMA GAR DBANG GIS MDZAD PAR YI GE RTZA BAR BKOD CING, ,RJE BTZUN BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS KYIS TSE DBANG BSKUR TSUL MDZAD PA DANG, KHYAB BDAG YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS 'DI'I SGOM LUNG GI ZHAL SHES @023A *, ,THOR BU BA BYUNG RNAMS KYIS ZUR RGYAN NAS, ,BTZUN PA BLO GSAL BSTAN SKYONG GIS, 'GAL BYED CES PA LCAGS MO PHAG GI LO, ,NAG PA ZLA BA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI RGYAL BA DANG PO'I NYIN, ,GDAN SA CHEN PO ZHA LU RI PHUG BDE CHEN CHOS KYI PHO BRANG GI SGRUB KHANG RNAM GROL YANG RTZER SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR DANG, DE 'DZIN GYI SKYES MCHOG DAM PA RNAMS SKU TSE BRTAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI NYAMS LEN GYI RIM PA SNYING POR DRIL BA NI, KHO BOS BYAS PA'I TSE SGRUB BU STON GONG KHUG MA'I NYAMS LEN RDO RJE RGYA MDUD BZHIN DU NYAMS SU BLANG BAR BYA'O, ,TSE SGRUB 'CHI MED BU STON GONG KHUG MA'I NYAMS LEN RDO RJE RGYA MDUD CES BYA BA BZHUGS PA AiTHI, ,SHU BHAm, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
